articles.description: WhatsApp is testing out a new feature that will allow you to hide your "Online" status from other users. The focus is to enhance privacy.
articles.content: WhatsApp is developing a feature long-awaited by users. The platform is testing a new setting feature allowing the user to hide the online status when the messenger is open. According to the WABetaIn… [+1554 chars]
